Origin, Basic White - Venetian Blind (247blinds)

The origin in basic white is made from heavy gauge aluminium guaranteed not to sag. Its wipe-clean practicality combined with the pure white, satin look finish make this blind an attractive option that is pleasing in both looks and functionality. If it's a fresh, clean style that you're looking for, blend the basic white with an all-white colour palette that's perfect for the bathroom or kitchen. Or instead, off-set pastel greens or yellows for a little extra warmth in a dining room or hallway. Origin, basic white - venetian blind the origin in basic white is made from heavy gauge aluminium guaranteed not to sag. Origin, Magnolia - Venetian Blind (247blinds)

The queen of neutrality, the magnolia version of their origin aluminium range is a simple choice that will match almost any colour it's paired with. Its satin finish and colour-coordinated cords provide it with a streamlined look that only the best of neutrals can achieve. If you love colour-blocking and continuation, go as far as setting the magnolia amongst matching magnolia walls, resulting in a clean, aerodynamic feel in a living room, hallway, or kitchen. Or for something a little more daring, team with your favourite colour - and with this kind of versatility, it really doesn't matter what it is! Origin, Black - Venetian Blind (247blinds)

Don't be put off by the colour black's reputation; the origin in black is much more versatile, and can be far less moody, than you might think. Paired with the right dcor, the gloss aluminium slats and coordinated fittings can look simple and sophisticated. Set the black against white walls in a modern living room and complement with bright limes or fruity oranges for a step away from monochromatic living and towards boldness and colour. Or team with soft pastels in the dining room for a truly contemporary look that you won't be able to tear your eyes away from. Origin, black - venetian blind don't be put off by the colour black's reputation; the origin in black is much more versatile, and can be far less moody, than you might think. Origin, Brushed Silver - Venetian Blind (247blinds)

The ultra-metallic brushed silver from the origin range is the height of utilitarian style. With a polished, near-matte finish, the blind's aluminium slats are sturdy and hardwearing, and easily controlled using the colour-matched cords that hang from the sides. The beauty of the brushed silver is that it can be used as part of a room's central colour scheme, or incorporated as a simple accent, in the same way as a fixture or fitting might. Utilise as an integral part of an industrial kitchen style, or place among your favourite bolds and brights in the living room or dining room. Origin, brushed silver - venetian blind the ultra-metallic brushed silver from the origin range is the height of utilitarian style. Premier 35mm Grained White Faux Wood (Swift directblinds)

Their best-selling 35mm premier faux wood range are made from high-quality flame-retardant pvc slats, and this bright, embossed white faux wood easily brightens the room. A perfect addition to rooms that need optimum light and privacy control, their faux wooden blinds are great for kitchens and bathrooms, with easy-care wipe-clean slats and a clean tailored finish, these blinds are a firm favourite with their customers. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for homes up and down the country. This white faux wood blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Origin, Grey - Venetian Blind (247blinds)

Dark slate in colour, the origin grey is comprised of satin-finish, heavy gauge aluminium slats, high quality pull-cords, and a clear wand tilt, resulting in a streamlined, contemporary blind. Given that the grey shade will match a multitude of hues, this is an obvious choice for those who like to change their dcor often. Go industrial in the kitchen by pairing the grey with worn metals, rustic woods, and slate floor tiles. Complement with dark greens and deep reds to continue the theme, and choose quirky statement pieces as accents, whether in the form of decorative accessories or functional appliances. The neutral colouring works in any setting, whilst the natural flow of the lines adds a calming presence that will have your guests drifting off to sleep in no time at all. Lifetime Smooth Dark Grey (Blinds By Post)

Lifetimesmoothdark greybrings an emphatic colour statement in yourroom, what's not to like about grey? Their outstanding quality lifetime blinds are made to the same high standards as all their other venetian blinds - we are confident you will not buy better quality blinds, backed by their 3 year guarantee. All blinds are sent with installation instructions, universal bracket (top fix, side fix or face fox) and a pelmet fascia to sit on the front of the blind headrail. The perfectly natural faux wood collection offers a waterproof and modern venetian blind, child safe and made to measure. Manufactured in the uk.

Custard Aluminium Venetian (Make My Blinds)

Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more The soft creamy yellow tone on the custard aluminium venetian is highlighted not only by its colour but by the matt finish that completed these slats. Perfect for pairing with lighter, neutral toned homes.

Amid-greyshade, theash grey25mm perfect fit blind will give any room the modern feel, this colour oozes with class. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the perfect fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinating greyheadrail and asilver bottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wand. Perfect fit ash wood venetian blinds. Its luxe colour even stretches to its included accessories, such as the wooden pelmet and bottom rail.For a bright and summery vibe, all year round, pair the oyster with pretty coral hues, in varying tones. Paint a window wall in the master bedroom a bold and vivacious coral, and accent matching cream bedlinen with coral-toned cushions and throws. Add gold or copper tones as a finishing touch. Pure Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame (Blinds By Post)

A brilliant white shade, the pure white 25mm perfect fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any anthraciteupvc window or door. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.
